oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: General Braxton Bragg
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Engraving of General Braxton Bragg, Confederate General, Civil War.

Bragg was a controversial figure in the Army of Tennessee. Although admired for his efforts, many of his relationships with other military personnel were tenuous. Infamous for directly causing the Confederate defeat at Lookout Mtn. and Missionary Ridge.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hall, Henry Bryan, active 1850-1900
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bragg, Braxton, 1817-1876
United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Portraits
